attributes.action: urge the Post Office to reconsider closing Derby Road Post Office in Bristol and to come and meet with the local people to hear their views.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Derby Road Post Office (aka Sefton Park Post Office) is the hub of our local community. Many families and old people with poor mobility due to health or economic reasons make use of its various services.
More info. can be found here: 
http://tinyurl.com/22ljyq
and here: 
http://tinyurl.com/ype6px
